TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LogFileLocation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines which predefined path the class uses to write its log files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Assign one of the LogFileLocation enumeration values to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property to specify which predefined path the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class uses to write its log files.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation CommonApplicationDirectory = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Use the path for the application data that is shared among all users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation Custom = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation ExecutableDirectory = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Use the path for the executable file that started the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation LocalUserApplicationDirectory = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Use the path for a user's application data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation TempDirectory = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Use the path of the current system's temporary folder.
